paper_abstract: Here-and-there models and equilibrium models were investigated as a semantical framework for answer-set programming by Pearce, Valverde, Cabalar, Lifschitz, Ferraris and others. The semantics of equilibrium logic is given in an indirect way: the notion of an equilibrium model is defined in terms of quantification over hereand-there models. We here give a direct semantics of equilibrium logic, stated for a modal language embedding the language of equilibrium logic. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Capturing equilibrium models in modal logic
